modShortDescription: Extender for original ZMXuiCPBBMl addon, which provide balance and adaptation to PackMule Perk, GodMode, Steroids and Poket Mods.
modDescription:
Extender for original [ZMXuiCPBBMl](https://7daystodiemods.com/zmxuicpbbml-the-63-slot-backpack-extension-mod/) addon, which provide balance and adaptation to PackMule Perk, GodMode, Steroids and Poket Mods.

This version is for 63 slots addon.

**Layout:**

* 14 slots avaliable from start. (Red)
* 35 slots will unlockable by PackMule [Perk](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-perks/). (Green)
* 14 slots will be unlockable by Poket Mods. (Blue)

**[Download](https://mega.nz/file/B0VCHbQY#ucz40QnKDBtXdpljhdg3AxP-IINeRGaF9UupnyEH3-o)** from Mega  
**[Download](https://github.com/G1ID30N/ZMXuiCPBBMPB/releases/latest/download/ZMXuiCPBBMPB.zip)** from GitHub

If you need help, you can use this [support link](http://discordapp.com/users/G1D30N#5198).
